title: The Dirty Secrets of The Food Industry| Dr. Steven Gundry | The Expert Series!
itunes:title: The Dirty Secrets of The Food Industry| Dr. Steven Gundry | The Expert Series!
description:
Dr. Steven R. Gundry, an American doctor, author, and former cardiac surgeon, drops by the studio with Rob to discuss "The Plant Paradox", and the impact of diet on health in this week's episode of The Expert Series!
